googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Andrew Glass
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: My main water line ruptured at an unknown time and I only discovered it because BWWB called to tell me my bill was going up exponentially. I called Jack at PlumbWorks and he came out the same day to inspect my yard and see if we could find the leak. We were able to locate it and he had a repair technician out the very next day. 10/10 will absolutely be using again.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: PlumbWorks LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Michelle Spates
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: What a great company! They came out the same day that I called them! They also did a fantastic job and had great customer service!Thanks Matt for your hard work!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: PlumbWorks LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jonathan Calvano
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: On time and reliable service. Thanks for your help!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: PlumbWorks LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: William Durst
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Excellent affordable punctual professional service. We have used Plumbworks for the past several years for maintenance and repair work for rental properties as well as our primary residence. They have done new plumbing work on some home remodel projects as well. Always quality affordable service. Can’t recommend them highly enough. Give Jack and crew a call for any of your plumbing issues you will be glad you did.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: PlumbWorks LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Chase Carter
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Have used PlumbWorks several times and have always been happy with the the work they've done.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: PlumbWorks LLC

## Business Information:
- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**: PlumbWorks LLC is a Limited Liability Company (LLC) incorporated on March 18, 2022. It is not accredited by the Better Business Bureau (BBB), but it is registered with the State of Alabama. For licensing, you would need to verify with the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, though the specific license number is not provided in the available sources[1][5].

- **Years in Operation**: PlumbWorks LLC has been in business since March 18, 2022, making it approximately 2 years old as of the current date[1].

aboutUs: PlumbWorks LLC is a premier plumbing company serving the Central and South Alabama regions. Our team of highly skilled and experienced professionals specializes in a comprehensive range of plumbing services, from routine maintenance and repairs to complex installations. With a deep understanding of local plumbing codes and a commitment to excellence, we deliver top-notch solutions tailored to your unique needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing partner dedicated to delivering exceptional service and lasting solutions.
sellingPoints: Certified expertise: Our team holds all necessary licenses and certifications, ensuring compliance with local regulations and industry best practices.
Rapid response: We understand the urgency of plumbing issues and offer prompt, reliable service to minimize disruptions to your daily routine.
Cutting-edge technology: We leverage the latest tools and techniques to diagnose and resolve plumbing problems efficiently, ensuring long-lasting results.
